text: Expressions of depression may be based on deviations from cultural norms = Researchers did a study where they had European American and Asian American participants watch 2 films: happy and sad = They hypothesized that the emotional expressions elicited by the sad film would show inappropriate emotional reactivity, but relative to cultural norms. - » R = L y_ =) &3 m_f : i /{—_ p—— ey /
